Description:
Detects the use of Fast Reverse Proxy. frp is a fast reverse proxy to help you expose a local server behind a NAT or firewall to the Internet.

Author: frack113, Florian Roth
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PUA - Fast Reverse Proxy (FRP) Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\frpc.exe' or process_path like '%\frps.exe') or command like '%\frpc.ini%' or (hashes like '%md5=7d9c233b8c9e3f0ea290d2b84593c842%' or hashes like '%sha1=06ddc9280e1f1810677935a2477012960905942f%' or hashes like '%sha256=57b0936b8d336d8e981c169466a15a5fd21a7d5a2c7daf62d5e142ee860e387c%'))
